[BeforeAttack] When in a Volatile E.G.O state, Atk Weight +1
[EndSkill] When in a Volatile E.G.O state, consume 5 SP

[WhenUse] When in a Volatile E.G.O state, consume 5 SP
[BeforeAttack] When in a Volatile E.G.O state, Atk Weight +1
[EndSkill] When in a Volatile E.G.O state, consume 5 SP

text.name: Stigmatize
text.desc:
If target has 10+ [Combustion], Coin Power +1
When in a Volatile E.G.O State, activate Blazing Strike instead
[WinDuel] Heal 10 SP
[DefeatDuel] Lose 10 SP

text.name: Stigmatize
text.desc:
<style="highlight">Coin Power +1 for every 7 [Combustion] on target (max 2)
When in a Volatile E.G.O state, activate Blazing Strike instead
[WinDuel] Heal 10 SP
[DefeatDuel] Lose 10 SP

text.name: Blazing Strike
text.desc:
Coin Power +1 for every 4 (sum of [Combustion] Potency on all enemies) (max 8)
[WinDuel] Heal 10 SP
[DefeatDuel] Lose 30 SP
Deal +5% damage for every Wrath Reson. (max 30%)
[EndSkill] Lose 15 SP
coinDescs: Deal +2.5% damage for every 1 [Combustion] on target (max 100%)
[OnSucceedAttack] If target has 10+ [Combustion], inflict 2 [Combustion] against (# of highest Reson.) random enemies
[EnemyKill] Randomly inflict [Combustion] Potency of the defeated target between all enemies (max 10. In Focused Encounters, between all Parts)

text.name: Blazing Strike
text.desc:
Coin Power +<style="highlight">2 for every 4 (sum of [Combustion] Potency on all enemies) (max 8)
[WinDuel] Heal 10 SP
[DefeatDuel] Lose 30 SP
Deal +<style="highlight">10% damage for every Wrath Reson. (max <style="highlight">60%)
<style="highlight">If at 4+ highest Wrath A-Reson., deal +20% damage for every Wrath Reson. instead (max 120%)
[EndSkill] Lose 15 SP
coinDescs: Deal +<style="highlight">4% damage for every 1 [Combustion] on target (max <style="highlight">120%)

[OnSucceedAttack] If target has 10+ [Combustion], inflict 2 [Combustion] against (# of highest Reson.) random enemies
<style="highlight">- If the above Reson. was a Wrath Reson., inflict +1 [Combustion] Count as well
[EnemyKill] Randomly inflict [Combustion] Potency of the defeated target between all enemies (max 10. In Focused Encounters, between all Parts)

text.name: Rue
text.desc: When in a Volatile E.G.O state, Base Power +1 for every 2 [Combustion] on target (max 10)

text.name: Rue
text.desc: When in a Volatile E.G.O state, Base Power +1 for every 2 [Combustion] on target (max <style="highlight">20)

1100921.name: Flaring Brand
1100921.desc: When the #1 Sinner to be Deployed Heads Hits, inflict +1 [Combustion] Count (4 times per turn)

1100901.name: Stigma Workshop Weaponry / Passion
1100901.desc:
This unit inflicts +1 more [Combustion] Potency with its Skills (Activates 6 times per turn)
When in a Volatile E.G.O state, and at 0+ SP, gain Coin Power +(SP/20). At 45 SP, gain Coin Power +3 instead.

1100902.name: Unstable Shell of Ego
1100902.desc:
Turn Start: At 40+ SP, consume 20 SP to enter the Volatile E.G.O::Waxen Pinion state. (this 'Turn Start' effect does not activate repeatedly)

If 2+ allies are defeated in a single turn, and if this unit's SP isn't at -45 at Turn End, reset SP to 20; then, enter the Volatile E.G.O::Waxen Pinion state. (if both conditions are met at the same time, whichever condition that results in a higher SP goes into effect)

If this unit gets Staggered due to damage or raised Stagger Threshold when entering the Volatile E.G.O state, recover from Stagger. If the Stagger is something that cannot be naturally recovered from, this unit does not enter the Volatile E.G.O state.

Gain [UnstableFeeling] while in the Volatile E.G.O state.

Turn Start: At 0 or less SP, exit the Volatile E.G.O::Waxen Pinion state.

1100911.name: Stigma Workshop Weaponry / Passion
1100911.desc:
This unit inflicts +1 more [Combustion] Potency <style="highlight">and Count</style> with its Skills (Activates 6 times per turn)
When in a Volatile E.G.O state, and at 0+ SP, gain Coin Power +(SP/20). At 45 SP, gain Coin Power +3 instead.
